discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ACF
ACF - Correct Answer

questions.question_text:
An administrator is concerned with data loss on Workspace ONE managed endpoints.
Which three configurations should be enabled to further improve the device security posture? (Choose three.)

choices.B: Configure compliance policies to monitor Roaming Cell Data Usage.
choices.A: Configure compliance policies to monitor rooted and jailbroken devices.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Answer is B according to the link below:
https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-Workspace-ONE-Access/21.08/ws1_access_connector_install/GUID-271C47F6-856C-40F0-97AB-A8AD95025F9C.html

questions.question_text:
An organization has purchased a SaaS Workspace ONE solution and wants to implement these:
✑ integration with back-end resources like Active Directory from Microsoft to sync users and groups
✑ Kerberos authentication
✑ integration with Virtual Desktops and Applications from services (Horizon 7, Horizon Cloud, or Citrix)
✑ third party integration with RSA SecureID, RADIUS for authentication
Which Workspace ONE component is required?

A customer is managing only iOS devices using Workspace ONE. They would like to begin managing Android devices.
What would be the first step an administrator needs to complete to begin managing Android Devices?

choices.C: Download and deploy Workspace ONE Access Connectors for Android devices.
choices.A: Download and deploy Workspace ONE Unified Access Gateway.
choices.D: Configure a Workspace ONE AirLift Server-side Connector.
choices.B: Complete Android EMM registration from Workspace One Console.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: CE
CE is the correct answer

Selected Answer: CE
The options detailed in the link below clearly show these as the only options:
https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-Workspace-ONE/services/intelligent-hub_IDM/GUID-012E7722-FC83-4EF5-8ADD-2457E29720FE.html

And says "....Hub Services can operate with Workspace ONE UEM alone providing a subset of Hub Services features - Catalog for UEM apps, Notification, Self-Service Support, and Custom Tab."
CE - The link referenced takes you to a page that even shows these two are the only options.

questions.question_text:
What two features of Hub Services can be enabled without enabling Workspace ONE Access and having the authentication mode set to Workspace ONE UEM?
(Choose two.)
For federal clients, FIPS 140-2 and AES 256-bit encryption are applied to which three areas? (Choose three.)
